content:
From: Jasmin Blanchette <j.c.blanchette@vu.nl>
Dear all,

Today I pulled Isabelle (08f1e4cb735f), wrote "isabelle jedit -l Pure Sledgehammer.thy" (from "src/HOL"), then got the Isabelle splash screen for some time (10 to 60 s), then sudden exit. I tried building Pure first, updating back to some changeset from last week which used to work, reboot: all to no avail. It's not the first time I run into such an issue, I think. How does one go around to debug this, given the opacity of the splash screen? And is there a workaround (I would be really keen on doing some Sledgehammer development today actually...).

Jasmin

isabelle-dev mailing list
isabelle-dev@in.tum.de
https://mailman46.in.tum.de/mailman/listinfo/isabelle-dev

From: Tobias Nipkow <nipkow@in.tum.de>
I had a similar problem once and it had to do with my external monitor.
Unpluggig it helped. But your issue seems to be different.

Tobias
smime.p7s

From: Jasmin Blanchette <j.c.blanchette@vu.nl>
It's the same issue, actually. Once I saw I had the same problem with Isabelle2020, and I recalled all the crash I used to have when teaching Concrete Semantics due to the beamer, I thought about the monitor -- about one minute before you wrote. Thanks anyway. :)

Jasmin

isabelle-dev mailing list
isabelle-dev@in.tum.de
https://mailman46.in.tum.de/mailman/listinfo/isabelle-dev
